Package io.wcm.devops.conga.plugins.aem.postprocessor

CONGA post processor plugins for AEM.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContentPackageOptions
    Option property names for content package post processors ContentPackagePostProcessor and ContentPackageOsgiConfigPostProcessor.
    ContentPackageOsgiConfigPostProcessor
    Transforms a Sling Provisioning file or Combined JSON file as used by CONGA Sling Plugin into OSGi configurations and then packages them up in an AEM content package to be deployed via CRX package manager.
    ContentPackagePostProcessor
    Transforms a JSON file describing a JCR content structure to an AEM content package to be deployed via CRX package manager.
    ContentPackagePropertiesPostProcessor
    Extracts properties from a given AEM content package and stores them as additional model options in the file context.
